questions.question: This arc features a battle on an island with a giant tree, where Luffy and crew face off against a Warlord of the Sea and a corrupt king. What is...?

Taking place on a ghostly island, this arc introduces a skeleton musician and features battles against zombie-like enemies. What is...?
This power is used to harden the body and weapons, increasing their offensive and defensive capabilities. What is...?
This technique, used by Brook, involves using the cold of the underworld to freeze opponents. What is...?
This power, used by a character known as 'The Magician,' allows for the manipulation of cards. What is...?
This captain of the Kid Pirates is known for his magnetic powers and rivalry with the Straw Hat Pirates' captain. Who is...?
